page.title: 14Senior Citizens
page.content: About 35000 people over the age of 65 live in Bexley Borough.About half of them own their own houses.There are many organisations providing facilities like:Age Concern Darby and Joan Clubs,Pop_in_Parlours,Salvation Army,British Red Cross,Church Clubs,Day Centres and one residential home. 10 percent attend some kind of club 2 percent have meals on wheels 5 percent have a home help 30 percent had a holiday each year. Most enjoyed living in Welling,but were worried about going out after dark.Most gained most pleasure from their televisions and their pets.
